Check If Contact Exists In DB
query:
SELECT 1 
FROM contacts 
WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = $1) 
  AND name = $2 
  AND birthday = $3;

Find All Contacts By Name
query:
SELECT name, TO_CHAR(birthday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as birthday 
FROM contacts 
WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM users WHERE username = $1) 
AND name = $2;
